META_DEFAULT_TITLE: Citizen OS - an e-decisionmaking platform for communities.
META_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Citizen OS enables participative discussion and voting for groups, when getting together offline or online at the same time is not an option.
META_DEFAULT_KEYWORDS: e-decisionmaking, e-governance, e-democracy, democracy, direct democracy, liquid democracy
TXT_REPORT_TYPES_SPAM: Contains spam or is unrelated to topic
HELP_CENTER_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you find yourself stuck or confused, just open up the Help Centre to find the answers to your questions. The Help Centre is always accessible via the bubble in the bottom right corner.
DONATE_TXT: Help us keep the platform free

HELP_WIDGET.TITLE: We’re here to help!
HELP_WIDGET.DESCRIPTION: Got questions or comments? Just drop us a message below.
HELP_WIDGET.MSG_REQUEST_SENT: Your help request has been sent!

SEARCH.TITLE: Global search
SEARCH.DESC_START_SEARCH: You can search topics, groups, categories and tags.
SEARCH.TXT_OOPS_NO_RESULTS: Oops, we couldn’t find any results matching your search :(

REGISTER_FORM.HEADING: Register a free account
REGISTER_FORM.HEADING_DESCRIPTION: Create an account to get free unlimited access to Citizen OS platform
REGISTER_FORM.HAVE_AN_ACCOUNT: Have an account? Log in now

GROUP_ADD_TOPICS.HEADING: Find and add topics to the group
GROUP_ADD_TOPICS.DESC: When you add a topic to the group, all members of that group will have access to the topic.
GROUP_ADD_TOPICS.NO_TOPICS_HEADING: You haven’t added any topics yet
GROUP_ADD_TOPICS.NO_TOPICS_DESC: Add topics to your group to incentivise your members to get engaged with them.This is not mandatory and you can still add topics later as well.

GROUP_INVITE.HEADING: Invite members to the group
GROUP_INVITE.EMAIL_DESC: Invite users via their username or e-mail address
GROUP_INVITE.NO_INVITES_DESC: Invite members to your group to hit the ground running.This is not mandatory and you can still invite members later as well.
GROUP_INVITE.INVALID_EMAILS_HEADER: Invalid e-mail formats found. Please correct before sending invitation.
GROUP_INVITE.NAME: Name

GROUP_SHARE.GENERATE_QR_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Generate a QR code that people can scan to come straight to the topic. You can add the code to digital or physical comms, and display it wherever the right people will see it.
GROUP_SHARE.GENERATE_QR_CODE_PRINT: To save the QR code as a PDF, open it up and use the "print as PDF" functionality.

TOPIC_INVITE_USER_DELETE.HEADING: Revoke invitation
TOPIC_INVITE_USER_DELETE.MESSAGE_MAIN: You are revoking the invitation of:
TOPIC_INVITE_USER_DELETE.MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: This person has not yet accepted the invitation and is not yet taking part in the topic. Removing them will result in revoking invitation. You cannot undo this action.
TOPIC_INVITE_USER_DELETE.SELECT_HEADING: Please select below what you want to do:

DUPLICATE_TOPIC.HEADING: Duplicate topic
DUPLICATE_TOPIC.MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to duplicate the topic ? This will create a new private topic in draft.
DUPLICATE_TOPIC.WILL_BE_DUPLICATED_1: Topic content as it is right now (including images, footnotes, comments, mini-votes)
DUPLICATE_TOPIC.HEADING_WILL_NOT_BE_DUPLICATED: This content will not be duplicated

REPORT_TOPIC.HEADING: Report topic
REPORT_TOPIC.PLACEHOLDER_REPORT_TEXT: Explain, why you found this argument inappropriate...

ARGUMENT_REPORT.HEADING: Report user to admin
ARGUMENT_REPORT.PLACEHOLDER_REPORT_TEXT: Explain, why you found this argument inappropriate...

ARGUMENT_REPORT_MODERATE.HEADING: Moderate argument
ARGUMENT_REPORT_MODERATE.ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to moderate this argument? You cannot undo this action.

ARGUMENT_WHY.HEADING: Why is this content hidden?
ARGUMENT_WHY.MESSAGE_MAIN: The admin chose to hide this content. You can review the reason below.

MODALS.ACCESSIBILITY_OPT_CONTRAST_DEFAULT_DESC: Citizen OS in its normal colour scheme
MODALS.ACCESSIBILITY_OPT_CONTRAST_HIGH_DESC: Citizen OS in its normal colour scheme
MODALS.CREATE_DESC_DISCUSSION: Choose this if you want to encourage a discussion before potentially moving to ideation, voting and/or follow-up.
MODALS.CREATE_DESC_IDEATION: Choose this if you want to gather ideas before potentially moving to voting and/or follow-up. No pro/con discussion available.
MODALS.CREATE_DESC_VOTE: Choose this if you want to collect people’s votes before potentially moving to follow-up. No pro/con discussion or ideation available.
MODALS.CREATE_DESC_GROUP: Create a group to which you can invite people belonging to the same organisation, club, location, etc.

MODALS.ADD_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Please provide your email address, so that you can receive invitations and relevant notifications.
MODALS.ADD_EMAIL_TXT_VERIFY: Important: Shortly after logging in you will receive an email to verify your email address. Don't forget to verify to complete your registration!
MODALS.ADD_EID_HEADING: Connect your account with your eID?
MODALS.ADD_EID_DESCRIPTION: Did you know you can sync your account with your eID? Click the button below to do this or continue without syncing (you can still do this later in your account settings).
MODALS.USER_CONNECTION_REMOVE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_Y: Are you sure you want to remove your connection with {{connection}}?
MODALS.TOPIC_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS_TITLE_DESCRI: Settings only apply to this topic {{topicTitle}}
MODALS.TOPIC_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS_LBL_TOPIC_UP: Topic updates (content, status, categories, reports etc.)
MODALS.REMOVE_TOPIC_NOTIFICATIONS_CONFIRM_ARE_Y: Are you sure you want to turn off notifications for this topic?
MODALS.REMOVE_TOPIC_NOTIFICATIONS_CONFIRM_YES: Yes, turn off notifications for this topic
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_HEADING: Are you sure you want to join this public group?
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to join this public group?
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_DESC: By joining this group you agree to the following:
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_POINT1: Your user name is publicly visible in the group members list by all group members
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_POINT2: You, similar to other members, will have only reading rights.
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_POINT3: The group activity is displayed under the "My activity" feed
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_HEADING: We'd love to know you better
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_DESC: Hi there! We're really excited to get to know our users, and find out what you use our platform for. Happy to share? It will help us evaluate our impact and make our platform better suit your needs.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_QUESTION_1: What do you use Citizen OS for?
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_QUESTION_2: Could we contact you to find out more? (We'll keep it brief, we promise).
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_LBL_CHECKBOX: Yes, I am happy to be contacted by a representative of Citizen OS.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_BE_CAREFULL: P.S! Always be mindful of what data you share.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_BE_GDPR: By submitting your response, Citizen OS will collect and process your personal data for the purposes of understanding user needs and contacting consenting users, in accordance with the relevant and applicable legislative acts related to the protection of personal data, including GDPR.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_BE_VIEW_MORE_LEGAL: For more information, please read our Privacy Policy
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_TEXT_THANK_YOU: Thank you so much for sharing with us. If you agreed to chat more, we'll be in touch soon! For any queries or feedback in future, please submit a Help Request or User Feedback via our Help Centre.

ACCOUNT.LBL_SHOW_IN_SEARCH: Show my profile in search results
ACCOUNT.LBL_SHOW_IN_SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: Display my name and e-mail in invite search results so that other people can easily invite me to groups and topics

DASHBOARD.HEADER_WELCOME: Welcome back to yout dashboard {{user.name}}
DASHBOARD.HAVENT_ENGAGED_TOPICS_HEADING: You haven’t engaged in any topics yet
DASHBOARD.HAVENT_ENGAGED_TOPICS_DESCRIPTION: Engage in topics by discussing, sharing ideas and voting. Or create your own topics and invite participants so they can share their thoughts.
DASHBOARD.HELP_US_HEADER: Help us make the best e-democracy platform!
DASHBOARD.HELP_US_LNK_KEEP_PLATFORM_FREE: Help us keep the platform free
DASHBOARD.SUBSCRIBE_FORM_DESCRIPTION: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates and news related to our platform and our work.

GROUP_CREATE.HEADING: Create a group
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_INPUT_NAME_DESC: Use a name that’s understandable and logical.
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_CHOOSE_IMAGE_DESC: Upload an image that properly represents your group.
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_LBL_DROP_IMAGE: Drop the image here or click the button
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_INPUT_CONTACT_EMAIL_DESC: This e-mail will be visible to participants – and everyone if it’s a public group.
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_RULES_OF_CONDUCT_DESC: Add rules of conduct, to avoid any bad experiences. ie. speak English or no hatespeech.
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_DESC: Set whether your group is visible for anyone or only by invitation.
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_PRIVATE_DESC: Only people with invites can join
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_CATEGORY_SELECT_DESC: Choose up to 3 categories that fit your topic.
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_LOCALITY_SELECT_DESC: You can assign a country and language to this group, making it more easy to find for local participants.
GROUP_CREATE.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Creating a group is a great way to give people a sense they belong to a community and incentivises them to engage more easily.
GROUP_CREATE.NOTIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Congratulations! Keep in mind you can always manage the group via the group actions.

401.HEADING_INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: Sorry, you haven't got sufficient permissions to access the resource
401.DESCRIPTION_INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: If you have an invite to topic or group, you need to accept it first. Please check your activity feed or e-mail.
401.HEADING_YOU_MAY_RECOVER: Still, you may recover from the unfortunate event by

REGISTER.REGISTER_DESCRIPTION: Create an account to get free unlimited access to Citizen OS platform

PASSWORD_FORGOT.PASSWORD_FORGOT_DESCRIPTION: No worries! We can send you a reset link so you can get a new password.

HOME.STATS_DESCRIPTION: Make smarter, more impactful decisions based on respectful discussions on our free, open-source participation platform.
HOME.FEATURE_DISCUSSION_ITEM_4: Argument popularity can be measured via “likes”
HOME.FEATURE_DISCUSSION_FOOTER_INFO: After the discussion you can move the topic into ideation, voting and/or follow-up.
HOME.FEATURE_IDEATION_ITEM_4: Argument popularity can be measured via “likes”
HOME.FEATURE_IDEATION_FOOTER_INFO: After gathering ideas you can move the topic into  voting and/or follow-up.
HOME.FEATURE_VOTING_ITEM_4: Argument popularity can be measured via “likes”
HOME.FEATURE_VOTING_FOOTER_INFO: After collecting votes you can move the topic into follow-up.
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_HEADING: Groups – harnessing the power of the people
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_1: Invite people into a group to easily give them access to relevant topics
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_2: Join a public or private group that deals with topics of your interest
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_3: quicker sharing or unsharing of topics, a group folder containing all topics shared to those users, and easier rights administration.
HOME.HEADING_WELCOME: Hi there, welcome to Citizen OS!
HOME.PUBLIC_GROUPS_DESCRIPTION: Have a sneak peek at some of the most popular public groups currently available on Citizen OS.
HOME.PUBLIC_TOPICS_DESCRIPTION: Have a sneak peek at some of the most popular public topics currently available on Citizen OS.
HOME.MISSION_BOX_DESC: To empower as many people as possible to participate in respectful, meaningful discussions. We aim to facilitate collective decisions on issues that directly affect people’s wellbeing.
HOME.HEADING_GET_STARTED: We can’t display results for what you’re searching. Maybe try another search or initiate the discussion
HOME.HEADING_BEGINNERS_GUIDE: A beginner’s guide to Citizen OS.
HOME.TXT_BEGINNERS_GUIDE: Hi there, welcome to Citizen OS! Read this topic to find out how everything works.
HOME.TXT_KEEP_IT_CLEAN_PLAN: Keep It Clean Plan by Let's Do It! World.
HOME.TXT_DESCRIPTION_KEEP_IT_CLEAN_PLAN: Here you can find all the documents and information on the Keep It Clean Plan.
HOME.TXT_DESCRIPTION_HACKTIVIST_COMMUNITY: Civic hacktivist community is a meeting space for people who stand for e-democracy and collaborative decision-making.
HOME.TXT_CITIZENOS_COMMUNITY: E-democracy discussions with Citizen OS team
HOME.TXT_CITIZENOS_COMMUNITY_DESCRIPTION: Join us in our platform development and e-democracy discussions.

MY.HEADING_NOT_IN_GROUP: You are not yet part of a group.
MY.HEADING_AT_LEAST_WE_HELP: At least you still have us to help you by
MY.HEADING_NOT_PARTICIPATED: You have not participated in a topic yet. Try it, it’s really cool!
MY.NO_RESULTS_FOUND_DESCRIPTION: We can’t display results for what you’re searching. Maybe try another search?

MY_TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_NO_PERMISSION_TO_DELETE_MEMBER: You don't have permissions to delete a member
MY_TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_PERMISSION_VIA_GROUP: Permission was granted via Group - you may remove User from the Group or override permissions by selecting appropriate value from the dropdown.

PARTNERS_CONSENT.HEADING: {{website}} would like to access following data from Your account:
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_PROFILE: View and edit Your Citizen OS profile - name, company, email, picture.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_TOPICS: View and edit Your Citizen OS public Topics and Topics created via the {{website}} website.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_VOTES: View and edit Your Citizen OS Votes in public Topics and Topics created via the {{website}} website.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_GROUPS: View and edit your Citizen OS groups.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_POLICY: {{website}} will use this information in accordance with their respective terms of service and privacy policies.

PARTNERS_LOGIN.HEADING: {{website}} works together with Citizen OS to offer you a great experience. If you want to use the platform to its fullest, please login to Citizen OS or register.

TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_EDIT: You are now in edit mode. You can add text or make changes to it. All changes are automatically saved.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_VOTE: This topic is being voted on, editing is no longer possible!
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW: Looks like your voting process resulted in a draw.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_DRAW_DESCRIPTION: Sometimes having several winning options is a good thing, but there are times, when you just really need one clear winner.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: Here's what you could do now:
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: It might be possible to solve this offline - for example, a co-located team could flip a coin between the two winning options. Also, if you had votes going to non-winning options, we suggest you run another vote between the two previously winning options only. This time, you could pre-determine a tie-breaker in case you have another draw: a coin flip, a default winning option (usually status quo wins in a draw), a person whose vote is decisive etc.
TOPICS_TOPICID.ADD_MILESTONES_PLACEHOLDER_SUBJECT: How is the decision being put into practice?
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This vote requires an ID-card or Mobiil-ID signing.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This document needs to be signed with an ID-card or Mobiil-ID to be registered. You cannot vote unless you identify yourself.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_REGISTERED: Thank you for your vote. You can still change your mind and your vote by choosing another option.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED: To download voting results, select a suitable format below. Our "human-readable" container comes with an additional file (comma-separated table, .csv) containing data of each individual vote, as required by Riigikogu and local governments. For systems that can't process such info (a la Äriregister) please select "machine-readable" file.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED_EXPIRED: Votes have now been cast. Please send topic to follow-up, then return here to download voting results.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_HARD_ID_EXPLANATION: ID-Card, Mobiil-ID or Smart-ID signing is required
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_DELEGATION_EXPLANATION: Allow users to pass on their voting right.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_NOTICE_DELEGATION_DISABLED_FOR_: When eID is the chosen method of voting, delegation is not allowed.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_STEP4_DESCRIPTION: You can choose either deadline or vote amount or combine them. When you combine them, the first that is reached will end the voting system.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_VOTE_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Define the end of the voting system based on the amount of votes counted. You can choose only one.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_MINIMUM_VOTES_DESCRIPTION: The amount of votes required for a successful closure.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_ALL_VOTES_ARE_IN_EXPLANATION: When every user in the topic has voted, the vote system closes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_SET_VOTE_REMINDER_EXPLANATION: You can set an automatic reminder email for users a few days before the end of the vote
TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_YOU_CAN_CHOOSE_OPTIONS: This is a multiple choice vote. You can choose max {{maxChoices}} options that align with your view.
TOPICS_TOPICID.MSG_CHOOSE_AT_LEAST_OPTIONS: You need to choose at least {{optionsCount}} options
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_DESCRIPTION_CHOICE_RANGE: Define up to how many choices a person can vote for. For example, you have 4 choices but you allow people to choose up to 2 out of them. You can only add as many as you have choices to choose from.
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_HAS_BEEN_DELETED_BY: This argument has been deleted by user {{usersFullName}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_HAS_BEEN_DELETED_BY_MODERATOR: This argument has been deleted by user {{usersFullName}} (moderator)
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_FOUND_INAPPRIOPRIATE_BY: This argument was found inappropriate by user {{usersFullName}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_READ_CODE_OF_CONDUCT: Read our code of conduct for more information
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_REPLY_FOUND_INAPPRIOPRIATE_BY: This reply was found inappropriate by user {{usersFullName}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_POI: Add information or ask a question
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_P: Use this option if you agree and want to leave an argument that is supportive or in favor of the topic.
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_C: Use this option if you disagree and want to leave an argument that does not support the topic.
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_P: Use this option if you want to make a short statement or a point, ask a question or clarify something about the topic.
TOPICS_TOPICID.PLACEHOLDER_EXPLAIN_YOUR_ARGUMENT: Explain and prove your statement here...
TOPICS_TOPICID.LOG_IN_TO_PARTICIPATE: You need to log in to participate.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_METIONS_TXT_NO_HASHTAG_DEFINE: Sorry, we cannot show you the social mentions as there is no hashtag defined for this Topic. Users with editor permissions can add the hashtag to fetch social mentions.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_MENTIONS_NO_MENTIONS_FOUND: Sorry, no social mentions found on Twitter for the hashtag
TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_QR_CODE_FOOTER_SCAN_CODE: Jump right into the topic {{topicTitle}} by scanning this QR code!
